CustomField.description: List of Pay Stub Violations - See Help Text for selection details.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Details for each selections: 1) Paid by check or cash without an itemized wage deduction statement 2) Itemized wage deduction statement provided but not accurate and/or incomplete 3) Itemized wage deduction statement not provided at least semi-monthly
CustomField.label: Pay Stub Violations

value.fullName: Paid by Cash or No wage statement
value.label: Paid by Cash or No wage statement
